title: Yext Crawler
description: The Yext Crawler helps you automatically populate your Knowledge Graph based on websites that you can crawl.

$id.description: The unique identifier for the Yext Crawler resource.

name.title: Crawler Name
name.description: The display name of the crawler.

enabled.title: Crawler Enabled
enabled.description: If true, the crawler will run according to its crawl schedule.

crawlSchedule.title: Crawl Schedule
crawlSchedule.description: Defines how often the crawler will index the website.

crawlStrategy.title: Crawl Strategy
crawlStrategy.description: Specifies the crawl strategy of the crawler

domains.title: Domains
domains.description: A list of domains or URLs to crawl, e.g. https://www.example.com

ignoreQueryParameterOption.title: Ignore Query Parameter Option
ignoreQueryParameterOption.description: Option for ignoring query parameters when differentiating crawled URLs

ignoreQueryParametersList.title: Ignored Query Parameters
ignoreQueryParametersList.description: Any query parameters specified in the list will be ignored when differentiating crawled URLs.

blacklistedUrls.title: Blacklisted URLs
blacklistedUrls.description: Any URLs that match any regex rule in the list will be omitted from the crawl.

subPagesUrlStructures.title: Sub Pages URL Structure
subPagesUrlStructures.description: Specified wildcard URLs will also be considered when using the Sub Pages crawl strategy, e.g. www.yext.com/bad-website/blog/*

headers.title: HTTP Request Headers
headers.description: Custom header values that will be passed to each crawled page.

fileTypes.title: File Types
fileTypes.description: Specifies which file types, if encountered, to crawl

oneOf.description: Specifies which file types should be crawled
If selected, all supported file types will be crawled, including any added in the future

rateLimit.title: Rate Limit
rateLimit.description: Specifies the maximum number of concurrent crawls

maxDepth.title: Maximum Depth
maxDepth.description: Specifies the number of levels past your root URLs for the crawler to index
